body_html: Did you run the configure.sh script from the master tf folder? As suggested please select the GPU option to be yes when asked if you need GPU support. Otherwise, please use this command instead: bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package to build without GPU support. I suggest closing this issue as this is a question to be asked at stackoverflow.

body: Did you run the configure.sh script from the master tf folder? As suggested please select the GPU option to be yes when asked if you need GPU support. Otherwise, please use this command instead: `bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package` to build without GPU support. I suggest closing this issue as this is a question to be asked at stackoverflow.
